v1.19.0.description: fixes focus issues while running NVDA and JAWS

v1.18.0.description: improved accessibility and screen reader support

v1.17.0.description: adds f-accent option to enable accent-themed select menus

v1.13.0.description: updates select and select-menu to be more accessible by adding tabindex of 0 to the trigger, the list, and the spans on select, adding role listbox to the menu in select, adding role option to the list items in select; updates typescript to handle accessible keyboard keycodes across select and select menu

v1.12.0.description: adds new option of f-flex to allow select-menu to fill the width of its container
updates select menu to close when the last item on the list is tabbed off, removes redundant aria-haspopup

v1.11.0.description: fixes issue where select-menu would not close when an item was selected

v1.9.0.description: updates f-border to also support fieldset
